properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.enabled
properties.description: Whether OpenTelemetry instrumentation for the Logback Appender is enabled.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-code-attributes
properties.description: Enable capturing of source code attributes. It might have performance impact.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-key-value-pair-attributes
properties.description: Enable capturing of Logback key-value pair as attributes.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-logger-context
properties.description: Enable capturing of Logback logger context properties as attributes.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-marker-attribute
properties.description: Enable capturing of Logback markers as attributes.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.capture-mdc-attributes
properties.description: Comma-separated list of MDC attributes to capture.

properties.name: arconia.otel.instrumentation.logback-appender.num-logs-captured-before-otel-install
properties.description: Size of the cache used to replay the logs generated before the initialization of the appender.
